item.title: Hugo not detecting changed pages on Mac
item.description: I’ve used Hugo for my blog for several years now, and it’s great. One of the things I love about it is the fast build time coupled with it’s live-reload feature. Using this I can edit my source (Markdown or Asciidoc) in one window, hit save, and see the preview update in my browser window next to it pretty much instantaneously. For copy-editing, experimenting with images, etc this is really helpful.
